steps.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp flour to the mixing bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp flour to the mixing bowl (without cleaning bowl first)

errors.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp flour to the mixing bowl (without cleaning bowl first)

steps.description: Measure and add-1.5 tbsp sugar to the mixing bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-1.5 tbsp salt to the mixing bowl

errors.description: Measure and add-1.5 tbsp salt to the mixing bowl

steps.description: Measure and add-a pinch of salt to the mixing bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-a pinch of sugar to the mixing bowl

errors.description: Measure and add-a pinch of sugar to the mixing bowl

steps.description: Whisk-Whisk to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl
Measure and add-1/4 tsp vanilla extract to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-1/2 tsp vanilla extract to the bowl

errors.description: Measure and add-1/2 tsp vanilla extract to the bowl

steps.description: Measure and add-2 tbsp water to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-2 tbsp milk to the bowl

errors.description: Measure and add-2 tbsp milk to the bowl

steps.description: Place-Place the paper cupcake liner inside the mug
Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp vegetable oil to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp olive oil to the bowl

errors.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp olive oil to the bowl

steps.description: Whisk-Whisk batter until no lumps remain
steps.modified_description: Whisk-Whisk batter with a spoon until no lumps remain

errors.description: Whisk-Whisk batter with a spoon until no lumps remain

steps.description: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a plate
steps.modified_description: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a bowl

errors.description: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a bowl

steps.description: Allow-Allow to cool until it is no longer hot to the touch
steps.modified_description: Allow-No time to allow for cooling so that it is still hot to the touch

errors.description: Allow-No time to allow for cooling so that it is still hot to the touch

steps.description: remove-then carefully remove the paper liner
steps.modified_description: remove- remove the paper liner by pulling strongly (not carefully)

errors.description: remove- remove the paper liner by pulling strongly (not carefully)

steps.description: Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 4 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a zip-top bag
steps.modified_description: Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 2 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a polythene

errors.description: Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 2 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a polythene
Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 2 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a polythene

steps.description: cut-Use scissors to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter
steps.modified_description: cut-Use knife to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter

errors.description: cut-Use knife to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter

steps.description: Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the plate in a circle around the base of the cake
steps.modified_description: Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the bowl in a square around the base of the cake

errors.description: Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the bowl in a square around the base of the cake
Measure and add-1/4 tsp baking powder to the bowl

Microwave-Microwave the mug and batter on high power for 60 seconds. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue
seal-seal zip top bag, removing as much air as possible
